original_title: The Brats and The Toy Thief
overview: The first ever acclaimed Mozambiquen animated short film.  In Central Mozambique, we are introduced to The Brats. A group of three, energetic and bright young kids who hang out in their tree house hideout. During one of their meetings, a strange kid approaches their tree. The Brats don’t think much of it, but after they find one of their precious stuffed animals stolen, they devise a plan to take their treasure back
title: The Brats and The Toy Thief
